mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Shopping (item_no, member_no, shopping_count, shopping_price) VALUES (#{itemNo}, #{memberNo}, #{shoppingCount}, #{shoppingPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT s.shopping_no, s.item_no, s.shopping_count, s.shopping_price, i.item_image, i.item_name, i.item_package, i.item_price FROM shopping s JOIN item i ON s.item_no = i.item_no WHERE s.member_no = #{memberNo}
